backend/main.mo: Defines types and state maps for residents, vitals, MAR, ADL, and access control, with authorization checks and resident management logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a branding update to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend components, pages, utilities, hooks, and styles across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the Maui Lane Care Home app with photo-based favicon and manifest links.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring router routes, ProtectedGate authentication wrapper, React Query, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication gate that shows a login card with branding when unauthenticated and renders children when logged in.
Logo component that resolves BRAND.logoPath with BASE_URL and falls back to initials if image loading fails.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: App shell providing header with logo, navigation, routed content, and footer, with sign-out clearing identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar showing only the Dashboard link with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog component that manages a full resident creation form, including nested fields, validation cleanup, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog for adding ADL records with required-field validation, identity checks, and mutation submission.
Displays a resident’s ADL records with sorting, deletion, and loading/empty states.
Re‑exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with validation, physician list management, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Form dialog for creating MAR records, including medication selection, validation, and submission.
Re‑exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Lists and sorts MAR records with formatted timestamps and delete functionality.
Dialog for adding a medication with dosage, route, times, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays resident info in a card with actions for viewing, toggling status, and deleting via confirmation dialog.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title text and an add-resident button.
Filter and sort bar allowing room-based filtering and sorting by room, name, or age.
Grid layout that renders ResidentCard components or an empty state message when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards summarizing total, active, and discharged residents.
Tabs for switching between All, Active, and Discharged resident views.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals with validation, Fahrenheit conversion, and form submission.
Displays a resident's vitals history with sorting, status indicators, loading states, and deletion via mutations.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Renders a placeholder card listing missing reference materials with a link to the full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides scoped React Query keys for resident directory operations based on principal identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, residents, vitals, and other records.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, theming variables, and print styles for the application.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports branding constants such as app name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function for merging Tailwind classnames.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Main resident dashboard fetching backend data, applying filters/sorting, computing KPIs, and rendering grid and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication records for residents, including a special case for resident ID 3.
Defines resident profile and medication types and supplies fallback mock profile data.
Mock list of residents with basic attributes like room, status, physicians, and medication counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Maps backend resident records to UI view models with computed age and formatted room strings.
Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI computation, and listing unique rooms for residents.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a resident’s profile with vitals, MAR, ADL, medications, editing, and print options using backend or mock data.
Print-only component generating a formatted resident profile report with personal info, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: UI page listing all required reference assets and screenshots needed to recreate the application's design.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, versions, and implemented features for a Maui Lane Care Home app based on an existing ICP + React scaffold.
